name: @pablozaiden/ralpher
description: Ralpher is a web and rest service used to control and manage Ralph Loops in opencode

scripts.build: bun run tsc && export workspace_dir=$(pwd) && (cd /tmp; bun $workspace_dir/src/build.ts)
scripts.test: export RALPHER_LOG_LEVEL=fatal && bun test --dots --timeout 15000 tests/unit tests/api tests/e2e tests/integration && bun test --dots --timeout 15000 --preload ./tests/frontend/setup.ts tests/frontend
scripts.test:backend: export RALPHER_LOG_LEVEL=fatal && bun test --dots --timeout 15000 tests/unit tests/api tests/e2e tests/integration
